title: fileOpen
name: fileOpen
description: Opens an file to read, write, or append.

arguments.name: mode
arguments.description:
Action to perform on the file, including the following:
- read
- readBinary
- write
- append

If you do not specify the mode, Lucee opens the file in read mode.

arguments.name: charset
arguments.description: The character set of the file.

arguments.name: seekable
arguments.description: can be used for function fileseek
